topic.title: A little girl sees her father ready to take a shower. She looks at his crotch and asks
topic.body:
"What's that, daddy?"
"Well, that's a penis, sweety."
"Will I ever get one?"
"Of course you will."
"When? When I'm older?"
"Nope, as soon as your mom leaves for work."

topic.title: Is it rape if the baby is already dead?
"Are you taking photos of my daughter on your iPhone?"
topic.body:
"Yes I'm taking photos of her," I replied, "But it's not what you think."

"So what is it then?" she asked.

I said, "It's a OnePlus."

Resilio确实是把DHT功能给割了

> [lock3](#comment_6_17wLdSCG2t81bg2Xn6ucimm4s1B82ytghG): 测试 果然不行
你发的4条，包括3条测试，我全看到了。只要能同步出去1个节点就能慢慢扩散到整个网络，不像表网上上传服务器成功就是成功失败就是失败。

1563919186_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body:
48-      Based on NADER's known use of multiple Apple devices, legal process was
served on Apple, Inc., in reference to Apple ID: piun2017@protonmail.com, and in response, Apple, Inc., identified the name associated with the account as "George Nader" with contact email piun2017@protonmail.com. The legal process provided by Apple,Inc. also included a user address which matched that of NADER's personal residence in Washington, DC.
49-      In my training and experience collectors of child pornography sometimes utilize multiple email accounts with which to conduct their illegal activities online.
50-      On March 24, 2018, NADER departed Washington-Dulles International Airport
in Dulles, Virginia Dubai,on a direct flight aboard Emirates Airlines Flight 232 destined for the United Arab Emirates. As of the date of this affidavit NADER has not returned to the United States or its territories.
51-      As NADER's location is unknown and likely outside the territory of the United
States, he is considered a fugitive from justice.
Money to flee trumps unlimited emails.

1636765653_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
(warning: my english is not good)

I am very interested in this subject, so i will be very happy to talk about it with you.

You said ` We need a Class War `.

First, as you mentioned ` the people have been successfully divided `. So, how are you going to find the "We"? 

This is the first big problem.

And then let's talk about the "Class War". They control the whole society system, economy, internet and media, educations, healthcare, police. of course they also control the armies. Yes, without us, the system can't be running, but without the system we also can't be living.

So, the second big problem is, if there is the "We", how should we war with them keeping living?
